content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's talk about the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are offering a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I am interested in renting it. I would like to offer 400 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 400 Euro per month is too low for the apartment I am offering.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that 400 Euro might be too low. How about 450 Euro per month? It's a fair price for the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 Euro per month is still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 500 Euro per month? It's a good price for the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 500 Euro per month is still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 550 Euro per month? It's a good price for the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 550 Euro per month is still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 600 Euro per month? It's a good price for the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 600 Euro per month is still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
